import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import getItems from '../services/getItems' export default function SearchResults({keyword}){ const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(function(){ getItems({keyword}).then(products => setProducts(products)) }, []); return products.map(product => <>
alert("Clicked!")}>
